Package com.pizzaMakerApp.style

Interface Style

public interface Style
The Style interface contains constants for colors and fonts used throughout the application. It defines a standard look and feel by providing a set of pre-defined colors and custom fonts.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Color
    BACKGROUND_COLOR
    Background color for the application, a dark shade.
    static final Color
    GLASS_COLOR
    Color used for glass effects, a very light white with 10% opacity.
    static final Color
    NEUTRAL_COLOR
    Neutral color, a shade of grey, used for neutral elements.
    static final Color
    NEUTRAL_HOVER_COLOR
    Neutral hover color, a darker shade of the neutral color.
    static final Color
    PRIMARY_COLOR
    Primary color used for major elements in the application, a shade of green.
    static final Color
    PRIMARY_HOVER_COLOR
    Primary hover color, a darker shade of the primary color.
    static final Color
    SECONDARY_COLOR
    Secondary color used for secondary elements, a shade of red.
    static final Color
    SECONDARY_HOVER_COLOR
    Secondary hover color, a darker shade of the secondary color.
    static final Font
    TEXT_BOLD_FONT
    The custom font used for regular text throughout the application.
    static final String
    TEXT_BOLD_FONT_NAME
     
    static final float
    TEXT_BOLD_FONT_SIZE
    The size of the regular text font.
    static final Color
    TEXT_COLOR
    Text color, generally white for readability against darker backgrounds.
    static final Font
    TEXT_FONT
    The custom font used for regular text throughout the application.
    static final String
    TEXT_FONT_NAME
    The file name of the font used for regular text.
    static final float
    TEXT_FONT_SIZE
    The size of the regular text font.
    static final Color
    TEXT_HOVER_COLOR
    Color for text hover state, a lighter white with 30% opacity.
    static final Font
    TEXT_SEMIBOLD_FONT
    The custom font used for regular text throughout the application.

    TEXT_SEMIBOLD_FONT_NAME
     
    static final float
    TEXT_SEMIBOLD_FONT_SIZE
    The size of the regular text font.

    TITLE_FONT
    The custom font used for titles throughout the application.
    static final String
    TITLE_FONT_NAME
    The file name of the font used for titles.

    TITLE_FONT_SIZE
    The size of the title font.
    static final Color
    TRANSPARENT_COLOR
    Fully transparent color.
